formattedAddress: 135 Bridge Park Dr, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 Bridge Park Dr, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA

originalText.text: Recoverie is exactly what Pier 5 needed!! I have been really into saunas etc for a long time so I’ve tried many places and Recoverie is my favorite by far. The owners are locals and super knowledgeable and friendly. Booking in app is super easy. Try out all the different therapies to find what works best for you and try doing combos. My favorite is red light straight into contrast (alternating sauna and cold plunge). Try out red light!!! It’s like a really gentle infrared sauna but you get super relaxed and I even noticed emotional release. Bring a bath suit but they have everything you need including slippers and a robe.

originalText.text: As someone who values self care and wellness, I’m ecstatic a place like Recoverie has opened in my neighborhood.   Located on a beautiful waterfront, the storefront's minimalist yet inviting décor exudes a sense of tranquility, and the moment I walk in I am greeted by the warm and wonderful staff. I love the contrast therapy (sauna/cold plunge) and the infrared sauna! They offer an array of other services as well that are sure to leave you rejuvenated. Must come and check it out!!

text.text: As someone who values self care and wellness, I’m ecstatic a place like Recoverie has opened in my neighborhood. originalText.text:
I've enjoyed the compression therapy twice and most recently, I tried the red light therapy.

As soon as you step in the door, you leave behind the hustle and bustle of the outside world and enter into a peaceful haven that invites different ways to recharge and reboot.

Staff is warm and friendly and even with the amount of people coming in and out, they do a great job ensuring each person is looked after and comfortable.

I highly recommend you check them out!

originalText.text: I did compression therapy at Recoverie and it was amazing! They said it will help me sleep better, and it did! I haven't slept through the night for months and after compression therapy I did! I absolutely recommend it to everyone who has trouble with sleeping or just want to relax. The owner, Siobhan is a wonderful, kind person who will help you with everything and make your experience flawless.

text.text: I did compression therapy at Recoverie and it was amazing! They said it will help me sleep better, and it did! originalText.text: Prior to Recoverie I had never tried any type of wellness treatments, but I went to Recoverie for the infrared sauna and I really enjoyed the experience!  Not only did the treatment itself leave me very relaxed and rejuvenated, but the staff at Recoverie were so friendly & welcoming.  Everything is provided too - robe, water, towel and slippers and you don't feel rushed at all as they give you more than enough time to enjoy the sauna. The space itself is also new, beautiful, and very clean and it also smells really nice!  The location is very convenient as well for those living in the BoCoCa area. I definitely plan to be back soon for some self-care wellness treatments!
